This opportunity builds on the heritage of Dell and EMC, and their worldwide presence, to lead the next evolution of computing, cloud, and data technologies.You will:We are seeking usability experts that have the confidence to design and lead research to understand user groups, their tasks, work environments, mental models, competitive landscape, and the rapidly evolving data landscape. The Principal User Experience Researcher will use usability tools and research methods to design and conduct qualitative and quantitative studies in order to understand users and improve product usability and usefulness.  The candidate will work closely with other designers, product managers, and engineers to identify and prioritize research opportunities and approaches.  Responsibilities include designing and conducting studies, analyzing and reporting results, and providing recommendations. Take the first step towards your dream careerEvery Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table.
